city.name: Cape Town
city.description: I would love to visit Cape Town because it is a dream destination for many people, viewing the Table Mountain and the sea are some of the things that attract me a lot. It is one of the biggest cities in Africa.With such a varying landscape - found in very few other places across the globe - Cape Town offers forests, beaches, gardens, mountains, oceans, grasslands, nature reserves, Winelands, as well as one of the most unique floral biomes in the world - fynbos

favouriteSubjects.name: Full Stack Web Development
favouriteSubjects.description: I love this course because I learn more coding skills and languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and many more that I still have yet to learn. My mentors are amazing.

favouriteSubjects.name: Agile Rapid Skills Acquisition
favouriteSubjects.description: I love this course because I learn more coding skills and languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and many more that I still have yet to learn. My mentors are amazing.

favouriteSubjects.name: Engineering Technologies Bootcamps
favouriteSubjects.description: I love this course because I learned more about machine learning and artificial intelligence. I also learned how to use Python to process datasets, and I now know a lot about the technology advancements and all the Industrial Revolution concepts.
